typography.instructions: Import 'Outfit' and 'Plus Jakarta Sans' from Google Fonts. Use Outfit for all headings (h1-h3) and Plus Jakarta Sans for body text. Use JetBrains Mono for any data values or code snippets.

colors.theme_strategy: Light Mode First. Dark mode should use deep charcoal (#0C0A09) instead of pure black.
colors.gradients: NO gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors. Subtle gradients allowed only on text or borders for 'active' states.

grid_system.dashboard: Bento Grid (Mode B): grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-4
grid_system.marketing: Tetris Grid (Mode A): grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-8

containers.card: bg-white border border-stone-200 rounded-xl p-6 hover:border-orange-200 transition-colors duration-300

buttons.primary: bg-orange-600 text-white hover:bg-orange-700 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-transform active:scale-95 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-stone-900 border border-stone-200 hover:bg-stone-50 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-colors
buttons.ghost: text-stone-600 hover:text-orange-600 hover:bg-orange-50 rounded-full px-4 py-2 transition-colors

inputs.style: bg-white border-stone-200 focus:border-orange-500 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-orange-100 rounded-lg h-12 px-4 transition-all
inputs.label: text-sm font-medium text-stone-700 mb-1.5 block

cards.dashboard_widget: bg-white border border-stone-100 shadow-sm rounded-2xl p-6 flex flex-col justify-between h-full hover:shadow-md transition-shadow
cards.job_card: group relative bg-white border border-stone-200 rounded-xl p-5 hover:border-orange-500/50 transition-all cursor-pointer

navigation.sidebar: bg-stone-50/80 backdrop-blur-xl border-r border-stone-200 w-64 hidden md:flex flex-col h-screen sticky top-0
navigation.header: bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-stone-100 sticky top-0 z-50

visual_enhancers.texture: Add a subtle noise texture overlay to the body background (opacity 0.03) to reduce digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Use 'soft-shadow' strategy: shadow-[0_8px_30px_rgb(0,0,0,0.04)] for floating elements.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid borders are preferred over shadows for separation. Use 'border-stone-200'.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use 'backdrop-blur-xl bg-white/70' for sticky headers and modals.

motion.loading: Use a custom 'pulse' effect on skeleton loaders. Do not use standard spinners if possible.
motion.page_transition: Fade in + Slide up (10px) on mount.

media.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for all UI icons. Stroke width: 1.5px (thin and elegant).

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text meets WCAG AA. Use 'text-stone-900' on light backgrounds.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings are mandatory. Use 'ring-2 ring-orange-500 ring-offset-2'.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add 'Outfit' and 'Plus Jakarta Sans' via Google Fonts in index.html or CSS.
2. SETUP TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to include the 'stone' and 'orange' colors as 'background' and 'primary'.
3. CREATE LAYOUT: Build a 'DashboardLayout' component with the Sidebar and Header defined in the guidelines.
4. BUILD COMPONENTS: Create reusable 'Button', 'Input', 'Card' components in /components/ui that match the design specs.
5. APPLY TEXTURE: Add the noise texture to the global body CSS.
6. USE IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash URLs for the Landing Page and Dashboard placeholders.
7. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures and noise overlays are mandatory.
